ygData.subject: Re: Heyers- Vomit and stuffs
ygData.msgSnippet: Im sorry to hear that EQ makes u throw out :( i am not a 3D ,- first person perspective gamer. Quake and DukeNukem gives me the headache and make me puke.
ygData.messageBody:
Im sorry to hear that EQ makes u throw out :(
i am not a "3D" ,-"first person" perspective gamer. Quake and DukeNukem
gives me the headache and make me puke. though it is a good game.

EQ offers multiple views. "F9" key. but to be effective u need to be in the
"first person" view. I use the Skycam when im combat and making sure no
other beasties around to backstab me.

Hope that u get used to the game or at least some other can benefit by
purchasing your game.

Rdgs
